Class Resolution

  • Object
    • Resolution

  • public class Resolution
extends Object
    A Resolution object stores the dimension of a picture in terms of number of pixels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Resolution(int width, int height)
      Constructs a Resolution object with the specified width and height, both in pixels.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height (in pixels) of this resolution.
      int getNumPixels()
      Returns the number of pixels of this resolution.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width (in pixels) of this resolution.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
